news.headline: UltraTech Cement Q4 FY25 Net Profit Rises 10% to ₹2,482 Crore
news.text: UltraTech Cement reported a 10% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for Q4 FY25, amounting to ₹2,482 crore. Revenue for the quarter grew by 14% to ₹22,788 crore, driven by a 17% rise in sales volumes to 41.02 million tonnes. Despite the strong financial performance, the company faced sluggish realizations due to competitive pricing pressures.

news.headline: UltraTech Cement Declares ₹77.50 per Share Dividend for FY25
news.text: The board of UltraTech Cement recommended a final dividend of ₹77.50 per equity share for FY25, totaling ₹2,283.75 crore. This dividend is subject to shareholder approval at the upcoming Annual General Meeting.

news.headline: UltraTech Cement's FY25 Net Profit Declines 13.8% to ₹6,039 Crore
news.text: For the full fiscal year FY25, UltraTech Cement's consolidated net profit decreased by 13.8% to ₹6,039 crore, down from ₹7,005 crore in the previous year. The decline is attributed to increased input costs and competitive market conditions. However, the company achieved a 7.3% increase in consolidated net sales, reaching ₹74,936 crore.

news.headline: UltraTech Cement Share Price Rises Amid Positive Q4 Results
news.text: As of May 12, 2025, UltraTech Cement's share price traded at ₹11,670.00, reflecting a 2.7% increase from the previous close. The stock has shown a 1.29% return over the past three months and a 22.26% return over the past year, indicating positive investor sentiment following the company's strong Q4 performance.
